sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('STG.AEMET_ESTACIONES_METEOROLOGICAS') IS NOT NULL
TRUNCATE TABLE STG.AEMET_ESTACIONES_METEOROLOGICAS;

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'direcciones' AND type = 'U')
	BEGIN
    	drop TABLE staging.direcciones;
	END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'medicos' AND type = 'U')
BEGIN
    drop TABLE staging.medicos;
END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'centros' AND type = 'U')
BEGIN
    drop TABLE staging.centros;
END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'hospitales' AND type = 'U')
BEGIN
    drop TABLE staging.hospitales;
END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'df_pois_g' AND type = 'U')
	BEGIN
    	drop TABLE staging.df_pois_g;
	END

preCopyScript.value:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = '@{item().table_name}' AND type = 'U')
BEGIN
    	drop TABLE STG.@{item().table_name};
	END

sink.preCopyScript:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'rutas' AND type = 'U')
BEGIN
    	drop TABLE staging.rutas;
	END

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT R.tipo_via , r.via , r.tramo , r.codigo_postal ,r.tipo_ruta, r.importancia , r.medio  ,r.sentido_transito , SS.[Nmero Va] num_via_farma, SS.hash_direccion hash_direccion_farma
FROM farma.staging.rutas R
left  JOIN (select D.[Cdigo Tipo Va] , D.[Nombre de la va] , D.[Nmero Va] , D.[Cdigo Postal]  , D.hash_direccion
from staging.centros c 
LEFT JOIN staging.direcciones d ON D.hash_direccion = C.hash_direccion 
where c.[Tipo centro] = 'E1 - Oficinas de farmacia' ) SS ON SS.[Cdigo Postal]  = R.codigo_postal
AND SS.[Nombre de la va] = R.via 
AND SS.[Cdigo Tipo Va]= R.tipo_via
where  r.via is not null

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
Municipios_KEY, Cod_Municipio, max(LOAD_DTS) LOAD_DTS , max(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
where not exists( select 1 from open_data.INE.HUB_MUNICIPIOS h where h.Municipios_KEY= o.Municipios_KEY)
group by Municipios_KEY, Cod_Municipio;

SELECT 
Distritos_KEY, 
Cod_Distritos , 
MAX(LOAD_DTS) LOAD_DTS , 
MAX(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE NOT EXISTS( 
  SELECT 1 
  FROM open_data.INE.HUB_DISTRITOS h 
  WHERE h.Distritos_KEY = o.Distritos_KEY
) and Cod_Distritos is not null
GROUP BY Distritos_KEY, 
Cod_Distritos;

SELECT 
Municipios_KEY, Municipios , max(LOAD_DTS) START_DTS , CAST(NULL AS DATE) END_DTS, max(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
where not exists( select 1 from open_data.INE.SAT_MUNICIPIOS h where h.Municipios_KEY= o.Municipios_KEY)
group by Municipios_KEY, Municipios;

SELECT 
Distritos_KEY, 
Distritos , 
MAX(LOAD_DTS) START_DTS , CAST(NULL AS DATE) END_DTS, 
MAX(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
--INTO  INE.SAT_DISTRITOS
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE
NOT EXISTS(   SELECT 1   FROM open_data.INE.SAT_DISTRITOS h   WHERE h.Distritos_KEY = o.Distritos_KEY AND START_DTS = O.LOAD_DTS ) and
Cod_Distritos is not null
GROUP BY Distritos_KEY, 
Distritos;

SELECT 
Secciones_KEY, 
Cod_Secciones, 
MAX(LOAD_DTS) LOAD_DTS, 
MAX(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE NOT EXISTS( 
  SELECT 1 
  FROM open_data.INE.HUB_SECCIONES h 
  WHERE h.Secciones_KEY = o.Secciones_KEY
) 
AND Secciones IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY Secciones_KEY, Cod_Secciones;

SELECT 
Secciones_KEY, 
Secciones, 
MAX(LOAD_DTS) START_DTS , CAST(NULL AS DATE) END_DTS, 
MAX(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
--INTO INE.SAT_SECCIONES
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE
 NOT EXISTS(   SELECT 1  FROM open_data.INE.SAT_SECCIONES h  WHERE h.Secciones_KEY = o.Secciones_KEY AND START_DTS = O.LOAD_DTS) AND
Secciones IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY Secciones_KEY, Secciones;

SELECT 
MAX(CONVERT(nvarchar(32),(HASHBYTES('SHA2_256',concat(LTRIM(RTRIM("Municipios")),LTRIM(RTRIM("Distritos")),LTRIM(RTRIM("Secciones")) ))),2)) as "LINK_SECC_DIST_MUNIKEY",
Municipios_KEY, Distritos_KEY, Secciones_KEY,
MAX(LOAD_DTS) LOAD_DTS , MAX(REC_SRC) REC_SRC 
--INTO INE.LINK_SECCION_DISTRITO_MUNICIPIO
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM INE.LINK_SECCION_DISTRITO_MUNICIPIO WHERE LINK_SECC_DIST_MUNIKEY=CONVERT(nvarchar(32),(HASHBYTES('SHA2_256',concat(LTRIM(RTRIM("Municipios")),LTRIM(RTRIM("Distritos")),LTRIM(RTRIM("Secciones")) ))),2))
GROUP BY Municipios_KEY, Distritos_KEY, Secciones_KEY;

SELECT 
metrica_KEY , 
metrica , 
MAX(LOAD_DTS) LOAD_DTS , 
MAX(REC_SRC) REC_SRC  
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE
 NOT EXISTS(   SELECT 1  FROM open_data.INE.HUB_METRICA h  WHERE h.metrica_KEY = o.metrica_KEY ) AND
metrica  IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY metrica_KEY ,metrica;

SELECT 
LINK_KEY LINK_DATOS_NIVEL_SECCION_METRICA_ANNO_KEY,
Secciones_KEY ,
 metrica_KEY, 
 anno,
 valor_metrica, 
LOAD_DTS, REC_SRC
FROM open_data.STG.@{pipeline().parameters.ORIGEN} o
WHERE
NOT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM INE.LINK_DATOS_NIVEL_SECCION_METRICA_ANNO WHERE LINK_DATOS_NIVEL_SECCION_METRICA_ANNO_KEY=LINK_KEY) and
Secciones is not null ;

scripts.text:
INSERT INTO MAESTROS.LINK_DIRECCIONES
    (hash_direccion, hash_codigo_provincia, hash_codigo_municipio, hash_codigo_tipo_via, [Cdigo Postal], [Nombre de la va], [Nmero Va], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    hash_direccion, 
    hash_codigo_provincia, 
    hash_codigo_municipio, 
    hash_codigo_tipo_via, 
    [Cdigo Postal], 
    [Nombre de la va], 
    [Nmero Va], 
    LOAD_DTS 
FROM 
    farma.staging.vista_direcciones_hash d
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.LINK_DIRECCIONES l WHERE l.hash_direccion = d.hash_direccion);

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_VIA 
    (hash_codigo_tipo_via, [Cdigo Tipo Va], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT 
    d.hash_codigo_tipo_via, 
    d.[Cdigo Tipo Va], 
    LOAD_DTS
FROM 
    staging.vista_direcciones_hash d
WHERE     NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_VIA htv WHERE htv.hash_codigo_tipo_via = d.hash_codigo_tipo_via)
;

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_municipio
    (hash_codigo_municipio, Municipio, [Cdigo Municipio], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    d.hash_codigo_municipio, 
    d.Municipio, 
    d.[Cdigo Municipio], 
    d.LOAD_DTS  LOAD_DTS
    FROM 
    staging.vista_direcciones_hash d
WHERE  NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_municipio hm WHERE hm.hash_codigo_municipio = d.hash_codigo_municipio)
;

UPDATE Sat
 SET Sat.START_DTS = DATEADD(d,-1,Stg.LOAD_DTS)
 FROM staging.vista_direcciones_hash Stg 
       INNER JOIN MAESTROS.SAT_DIRECCIONES Sat
           ON  Sat.hash_direccion      = Stg.hash_direccion
 WHERE Sat.hash_diff <> Stg.[hash_diff]
               AND Sat.[END_DTS] IS NULL
               AND Sat.[START_DTS] < Stg.LOAD_DTS
 ; 

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DIRECCIONES 
    (hash_direccion, direccion_normalizada, lat, lng, geocodificador, cp, dq, START_DTS, END_DTS,hash_diff)
SELECT DISTINCT 
    d.hash_direccion, 
    d.direccion_normalizada, 
    d.lat, 
    d.lng, 
    d.geocodificador, 
    d.cp, 
    d.dq, 
    d.LOAD_DTS START_DTS, 
    NULL END_DTS,
    hash_diff
--INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DIRECCIONES
    FROM 
    staging.vista_direcciones_hash d    
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DIRECCIONES sd WHERE sd.hash_direccion = d.hash_direccion AND sd.hash_diff = d.hash_diff);
      
INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_PROVINCIA 
    (hash_codigo_provincia, Provincia, [Cdigo Provincia], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT DISTINCT
    hash_codigo_provincia, 
    Provincia, 
    [Cdigo Provincia], 
    LOAD_DTS
--INTO MAESTROS.HUB_PROVINCIA  
FROM 
    farma.staging.vista_direcciones_hash d
WHERE     NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_PROVINCIA l WHERE l.hash_codigo_provincia = d.hash_codigo_provincia)
;

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_CODIGO_CENTRO 
    (hash_codigo_centro, [Cdigo de Centro Normalizado REGCESS (CCN)], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT hash_codigo_centro, 
    [Cdigo de Centro Normalizado REGCESS (CCN)], 
    LOAD_DTS
--INTO MAESTROS.HUB_CODIGO_CENTRO 
    FROM 
    farma.staging.hash_centros_view 
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_CODIGO_CENTRO WHERE hash_codigo_centro = farma.staging.hash_centros_view.hash_codigo_centro);
   
 INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_CENTRO 
    (hash_tipo_centro, [Tipo centro], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT hash_tipo_centro, 
    [Tipo centro], 
    LOAD_DTS
--INTO MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_CENTRO 
    FROM 
    farma.staging.hash_centros_view 
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_CENTRO WHERE hash_tipo_centro = farma.staging.hash_centros_view.hash_tipo_centro)
   ;
  
  INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_DEPENDENCIA_FUNCIONAL 
    (hash_dependencia_funcional, [Dependencia  Funcional], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT hash_dependencia_funcional, 
    [Dependencia  Funcional], 
    LOAD_DTS
--INTO MAESTROS.HUB_DEPENDENCIA_FUNCIONAL 
    FROM 
    farma.staging.hash_centros_view 
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_DEPENDENCIA_FUNCIONAL WHERE hash_dependencia_funcional = farma.staging.hash_centros_view.hash_dependencia_funcional);
   
   INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_GRUPO_FUNCIONAL 
    (hash_grupo_funcional, [Grupo de dependencia  Funcional], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT hash_grupo_funcional, 
    [Grupo de dependencia  Funcional], 
    LOAD_DTS
--INTO MAESTROS.HUB_GRUPO_FUNCIONAL
    FROM 
    farma.staging.hash_centros_view 
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_GRUPO_FUNCIONAL WHERE hash_grupo_funcional = farma.staging.hash_centros_view.hash_grupo_funcional);
   
   INSERT INTO MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_AUTORIZACION 
    (hash_tipo_autorizacion, [Tipo de ltima Autorizacin], LOAD_DTS)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT hash_tipo_autorizacion, 
    [Tipo de ltima Autorizacin], 
    LOAD_DTS
--INTO MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_AUTORIZACION 
    FROM 
    farma.staging.hash_centros_view 
WHERE 
    NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.HUB_TIPO_AUTORIZACION WHERE hash_tipo_autorizacion = farma.staging.hash_centros_view.hash_tipo_autorizacion);
   

   

UPDATE Sat
 SET Sat.START_DTS = DATEADD(d,-1,Stg.LOAD_DTS)
 FROM staging.hash_centros_view Stg 
       INNER JOIN MAESTROS.SAT_CENTRO Sat
           ON  Sat.hash_codigo_centro      = Stg.hash_codigo_centro
 WHERE Sat.hash_diff <> Stg.[hash_diff]
               AND Sat.[END_DTS] IS NULL
               AND Sat.[START_DTS] < Stg.LOAD_DTS
 ;    
   
   
INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_CENTRO 
    (hash_codigo_centro, 
    [Nombre Centro], 
    [Cdigo Comunidad Autnoma], 
    [Correo  Electrnico], 
    Fax, 
    Telfono, 
    Url, 
    [Fecha Autorizacin  de Funcionamiento], 
    [Fecha de ltima  Autorizacin],
     START_DTS,
     END_DTS,
     hash_diff)
SELECT 
    DISTINCT hash_codigo_centro, 
    [Nombre Centro],

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
     u.HASH,
    1 AS grado_proximidad, 
    CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana2, ',', '.') AS float) - CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana1, ',', '.') AS float) AS dif_distancia,
    MAX(CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana2, ',', '.') AS float) - CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana1, ',', '.') AS float)) OVER (PARTITION BY u.HASH) AS max_dif_distancia,
    MIN(CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana2, ',', '.') AS float) - CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana1, ',', '.') AS float)) OVER (PARTITION BY u.HASH) AS min_dif_distancia,
    c.*
    FROM farma.staging.ZI_catastro zc
    JOIN staging.ubicaciones u ON u.hash_direccion = zc.hash_farmacia_cercana1 
    JOIN
    (SELECT cod_agr_portales ,ref_cat_finca, seccioncensal,  superf_media_viviendas,
        altura_plantas_viviendas, total_plantas_viviendas, antiguedad_viviendas,  superf_media_inmuebles,
        altura_plantas_inmuebles, total_plantas_inmuebles, antiguedad_inmuebles,
        usos, cultivos, superf_media_oficinas,
        superf_media_comercios, num_viviendas
        FROM staging.catastro) c ON c.ref_cat_finca = zc.ref_cat_finca     
UNION ALL
    SELECT
    u.HASH,
    -1 AS grado_proximidad, 
    CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana2, ',', '.') AS float) - CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana1, ',', '.') AS float) AS dif_distancia,
    MAX(CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana2, ',', '.') AS float) - CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana1, ',', '.') AS float)) OVER (PARTITION BY u.HASH) AS max_dif_distancia,
    MIN(CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana2, ',', '.') AS float) - CAST(REPLACE(distancia_farmacia_cercana1, ',', '.') AS float)) OVER (PARTITION BY u.HASH) AS min_dif_distancia,
    c.*
    FROM farma.staging.ZI_catastro zc
    JOIN staging.ubicaciones u ON u.hash_direccion = zc.hash_farmacia_cercana2
    JOIN
    (SELECT cod_agr_portales ,ref_cat_finca, seccioncensal,  superf_media_viviendas,
        altura_plantas_viviendas, total_plantas_viviendas, antiguedad_viviendas,  superf_media_inmuebles,
        altura_plantas_inmuebles, total_plantas_inmuebles, antiguedad_inmuebles,
        usos, cultivos, superf_media_oficinas,
        superf_media_comercios, num_viviendas
        FROM staging.catastro) c ON c.ref_cat_finca = zc.ref_cat_finca;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
WITH VIVIENDAS_SECCION AS (
    SELECT 
        seccioncensal, 
        SUM(num_viviendas) AS num_viviendas
    FROM 
        farma.staging.catastro
    GROUP BY 
        seccioncensal
)
SELECT 
    DIU.seccioncensal,
    CASE WHEN NULLIF(vs.num_viviendas, 0) IS NOT NULL THEN diu.Poblacin / vs.num_viviendas ELSE NULL END AS poblacion_vivienda,
    diu.[Renta bruta media por persona] AS renta_bruta_media_persona,
    diu.[Fuente de ingreso: salario] AS ingreso_salario,
    diu.[Fuente de ingreso: pensiones] AS ingreso_pensiones,
    diu.[Fuente de ingreso: prestaciones por desempleo] AS ingreso_prestaciones_desempleo,
    diu.[Fuente de ingreso: otras prestaciones] AS ingreso_otras_prestaciones,
    diu.[Fuente de ingreso: otros ingresos] AS ingreso_otros,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por debajo de 10.000 Euros]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_debajo_10000,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por debajo de 5.000 Euros]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_debajo_5000,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por debajo de 7.500 Euros]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_debajo_7500,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por debajo 40% de la mediana]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_debajo_40,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por debajo 50% de la mediana]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_debajo_50,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por debajo 60% de la mediana]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_debajo_60,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por encima 140% de la mediana]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_encima_140,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por encima 160% de la mediana]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_encima_160,
    (diu.[Poblacin con ingresos por unidad de consumo por encima 200% de la mediana]/100) AS porcentaje_ingresos_encima_200,
    (diu.[Porcentaje de hogares unipersonales]/100) AS porcentaje_hogares_unipersonales,
    (diu.[Porcentaje de poblacin menor de 18 aos]/100) AS porcentaje_poblacion_menor_18,
    (diu.[Porcentaje de poblacin de 65 y ms aos]/100) AS porcentaje_poblacion_65_mas,
    (diu.[Porcentaje de poblacin espaola]/100) AS porcentaje_poblacion_espaola,
    CASE WHEN NULLIF(diu.Poblacin, 0) IS NOT NULL THEN (diu.[Ambos Sexos_0-4]/diu.Poblacin) ELSE NULL END AS porcentaje_menores_5,
    CASE WHEN NULLIF(diu.Poblacin, 0) IS NOT NULL THEN 
        (([Ambos Sexos_75-79] + [Ambos Sexos_80-84] + [Ambos Sexos_85-89] + [Ambos Sexos_90-94] +[Ambos Sexos_95-99]) / diu.Poblacin) 
    ELSE NULL END AS porcentaje_mayores_75,
    CASE WHEN NULLIF(diu.Poblacin, 0) IS NOT NULL THEN (diu.[Ambos Sexos_Total frica]/diu.Poblacin) ELSE NULL END AS porcentaje_Africa   
FROM  
    calculos.DATOS_INE_ULTIMOS AS diu 
LEFT JOIN 
    VIVIENDAS_SECCION AS vs ON vs.seccioncensal = diu.seccioncensal;

	superf_media_comercios float NULL,
	superf_min_comercios float NULL,
	superf_max_comercios float NULL,
	geo_gps_y_latitud float NOT NULL,
	geo_gps_x_longitud float NOT NULL,
	geo_coordenadas geography NULL,

);

SELECT f.anno, c.seccioncensal,
    CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(c.num_viviendas AS DECIMAL)) = 0 THEN 0
         ELSE ROUND((SUM(CAST(c.num_viviendas AS DECIMAL)) - avg(f.familias)) / NULLIF(SUM(CAST(c.num_viviendas AS DECIMAL)), 0), 3)
    END AS Por_Segun_vivienda
FROM geo_area.tb_catastro_portales_nueva c
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT *, ROUND(poblacion / NULLIF(tamao_medio_hogar, 0), 3) AS familias
    FROM geo_area.datos_integracion_sc
    WHERE tamao_medio_hogar IS NOT NULL AND tamao_medio_hogar <> 0
    ) f ON c.seccioncensal = f.seccioncensal and f.anno > cast(replace(c.antiguedad_viviendas,',','.') as int)
GROUP BY f.anno, c.seccioncensal;

SELECT cod_agr_portales, ref_cat_finca, c.seccioncensal, d.anno,
CAST(SUBSTRING(c.seccioncensal,1,5) as int) as cod_sc_provin_municipio,
    ROUND(CAST(REPLACE(geo_gps_y_latitud,',','.') as float),5) as latitud,
    ROUND(CAST(REPLACE(geo_gps_x_longitud,',','.') as float),5) as longitud,
    ROUND(CAST(REPLACE(geo_gps_y_latitud,',','.') as float),2) as lat_short,
    ROUND(CAST(REPLACE(geo_gps_x_longitud,',','.') as float),2) as long_short,
num_viviendas, superf_media_viviendas, superf_min_viviendas, superf_max_viviendas, altura_plantas_viviendas, total_plantas_viviendas, antiguedad_viviendas, num_inmuebles, superf_media_inmuebles, superf_min_inmuebles, superf_max_inmuebles, altura_plantas_inmuebles, total_plantas_inmuebles, antiguedad_inmuebles, cultivos, num_comercios, num_oficinas, superf_media_oficinas, superf_min_oficinas, superf_max_oficinas, superf_media_comercios, superf_min_comercios, superf_max_comercios, geo_gps_y_latitud, geo_gps_x_longitud, geo_gps_y_x, num_gps_y_latitud, num_gps_x_longitud, zonacatastral, cod_zona_concent, f_datos_catastrales, f_proceso_actualizacion
, tamao_medio_hogar, renta_media_uc, renta_mediana_uc, 
renta_bruta_media_hogar, renta_bruta_media_persona, renta_neta_media_hogar, 
renta_neta_media_persona, fuente_ingreso_otras_pres, fuente_ingreso_otros_ing,
fuente_ingreso_pension, fuente_ingreso_desempleo, fuente_ingreso_salario, 
por_poblacion_renta_menor_10000, por_poblacion_renta_menor_5000, por_poblacion_renta_menor_7500,
por_poblacion_renta_mediana_menor_40, por_poblacion_renta_mediana_menor_50, por_poblacion_renta_mediana_menor_60,
por_poblacion_renta_mediana_mayor_140, por_poblacion_renta_mediana_mayor_160, por_poblacion_renta_mediana_mayor_200,
edad_media_poblacion, por_hogares_unipersonales, por_menor_18, poblacion, por_poblacion_espanola, por_mayor_65,
    (1 - s.por_segun_vivienda) * c.num_viviendas * d.tamao_medio_hogar  AS poblacion_viviendas,
    (1 - s.por_segun_vivienda) * c.num_viviendas  as total_familias_viviendas,
    s.por_segun_vivienda
    from geo_area.tb_catastro_portales_nueva c
left join geo_area.datos_integracion_sc d on (c.seccioncensal = d.seccioncensal)
left join geo_area.ratio_segunda_vivienda s on (c.seccioncensal = s.seccioncensal)
and d.anno = s.anno
where d.anno >  cast(replace(c.antiguedad_viviendas,',','.') as int)

scripts.text:
insert into MAESTROS.LINK_PUNTO_ZONA 
select DISTINCT  key_link_punto_zona, cod_punto, hash_farmacia_cercana, TRY_CONVERT(DATE,LOAD_DTS) LOAD_DTS
--into MAESTROS.LINK_PUNTO_ZONA
from staging.zonas_influencia_rutas_hd f
where not EXISTS (select 1 from MAESTROS.LINK_PUNTO_ZONA l where  l.key_link_punto_zona= f.key_link_punto_zona)
;

insert into MAESTROS.SAT_PUNTO_ZONA
select DISTINCT  key_link_punto_zona,distancia_ruta, calles_ruta ,hash_diff_link_punto_zona, TRY_CONVERT(DATE,LOAD_DTS) EFFECTIVE_DATETIME,
CAST(NULL AS DATE) EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'zonas_influencia_rutas_hd' ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--into MAESTROS.SAT_PUNTO_ZONA
from staging.zonas_influencia_rutas_hd f
where not EXISTS (select 1 from MAESTROS.SAT_PUNTO_ZONA l where  l.key_link_punto_zona= f.key_link_punto_zona AND l.hash_diff_link_punto_zona = f.hash_diff_link_punto_zona)
;


WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT
        key_link_punto_zona,
        EFFECTIVE_DATETIME,
        EXPIRY_DATETIME,
        ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY key_link_punto_zona ORDER BY EFFECTIVE_DATETIME DESC, (CASE WHEN EXPIRY_DATETIME IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC) AS rn,
        MAX(EFFECTIVE_DATETIME) OVER (PARTITION BY key_link_punto_zona) AS MaxEffectiveDate
    FROM
        MAESTROS.SAT_PUNTO_ZONA
    WHERE
        EXPIRY_DATETIME IS NULL
)
UPDATE CTE
SET
    EXPIRY_DATETIME = (CASE WHEN rn = 1 THEN EXPIRY_DATETIME ELSE MaxEffectiveDate END),
    ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR = (CASE WHEN rn = 1 THEN 'S' ELSE 'N' END)
WHERE
    rn > 1 OR (rn = 1 AND ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR <> 'S');

--crea copia temporal zonas_influencia_ruta 
select cast(lpz.cod_punto  as varchar(100)) cod_punto, cast(lpz.hash_farmacia_cercana as varchar(100)) hash_farmacia_cercana , spz.distancia_ruta ,  
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY cod_punto  ORDER BY spz.distancia_ruta ASC  ) AS posicion
into calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo_temp 
from MAESTROS.LINK_PUNTO_ZONA lpz 
join MAESTROS.SAT_PUNTO_ZONA spz on spz.key_link_punto_zona = lpz.key_link_punto_zona 

-- inserta los registros que aun no tenemos con rutas de las zonas lineales 
insert into calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo_temp
select cod_punto , hash_farmacia_cercana1 hash_farmacia_cercana , distancia_farmacia_cercana1 distancia_ruta, 1 posicion  
from farma.calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo z
where not EXISTS (select 1 from calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo_temp zr where zr.cod_punto = z.cod_punto)

insert into calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo_temp
select cod_punto , hash_farmacia_cercana2 hash_farmacia_cercana , distancia_farmacia_cercana2 distancia_ruta, 2 posicion  
from farma.calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo z
where not EXISTS (select 1 from calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo_temp zr where zr.cod_punto = z.cod_punto)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo 

EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo_temp', N'zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo', 'OBJECT';

CREATE INDEX zona_idx_cod_punto ON calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo(cod_punto);
CREATE INDEX zona_idx_hash_farmacia_cercana1 ON calculos.zonas_influencia_ruta_calculo(hash_farmacia_cercana);


SELECT cast(cod_punto as varchar(100)) cod_punto, Lat, lng, 
       cast(hash_farmacia_cercana1 as varchar(100)) hash_farmacia_cercana1, distancia_farmacia_cercana1, 
       cast(hash_farmacia_cercana2 as varchar(100)) hash_farmacia_cercana2, distancia_farmacia_cercana2, 
       cast(hash_farmacia_cercana3 as varchar(100)) hash_farmacia_cercana3, distancia_farmacia_cercana3
INTO calculos.farma_calculos_temp
FROM farma.calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo_hd;

-- Borrar la tabla antigua
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo_hd_tabla;

-- Cambiar el nombre de la tabla temporal al definitivo
EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.farma_calculos_temp', N'zonas_influencia_calculo_hd_tabla', 'OBJECT';


-- Crear ndices en la nueva tabla
CREATE INDEX idx_cod_punto ON calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo_hd_tabla(cod_punto);
CREATE INDEX idx_hash_farmacia_cercana1 ON calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo_hd_tabla(hash_farmacia_cercana1);
CREATE INDEX idx_hash_farmacia_cercana2 ON calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo_hd_tabla(hash_farmacia_cercana2);
CREATE INDEX idx_hash_farmacia_cercana3 ON calculos.zonas_influencia_calculo_hd_tabla(hash_farmacia_cercana3);

WITH ResenasPorSemana AS (
    SELECT 
        l.place_id,
        DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review)) AS semana,
        COUNT(*) AS num_resenas_semana,
        count(review) as num_comentarios,
        count(response) as num_respuestas,        
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '5.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_5,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '4.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_4,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '3.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_3,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '2.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_2,
        SUM(CASE s.rating WHEN '1.0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS num_resenas_1
    FROM MAESTROS.LINK_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS l 
    JOIN MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEW_TEXTOS s 
        ON s.hash_key_review_place = l.hash_key_review_place 
        AND s.ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR = 'S'
    GROUP BY 
        l.place_id,
        DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, l.date_review) ) 
),
RankedResenasPorSemana AS (
    SELECT *,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY num_resenas_semana DESC) AS Rank
    FROM ResenasPorSemana
), ResenasPorPlace as (
SELECT
    r.place_id,    
    MIN(r.semana) AS desde,
    MAX(r.semana) AS hasta,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, DATEDIFF(week, MIN(r.semana), MAX(r.semana)) ) AS semanas_historia,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, COUNT(DISTINCT r.semana) ) AS num_semanas_con_resenas,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(CASE WHEN r.num_resenas_5 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)  ) AS num_semanas_con_resenas_5,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(CASE WHEN r.num_resenas_1 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ) AS num_semanas_con_resenas_1,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(r.num_resenas_semana) ) AS num_resenas,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(r.num_comentarios)) AS comentarios,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT, SUM(r.num_respuestas) ) AS num_respuestas,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_5) ) AS num_resenas_5,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_4)) AS num_resenas_4,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_3)) AS num_resenas_3,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_2)) AS num_resenas_2,
    SUM(TRY_CONVERT (float,r.num_resenas_1)) AS num_resenas_1,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, SUM(CASE WHEN r.Rank = 1 THEN r.num_resenas_semana ELSE 0 END)) AS TotalResenasEnSemanaMasResenas,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, SUM(CASE WHEN r.Rank = 1 THEN r.num_resenas_5 ELSE 0 END) ) AS Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas,
    TRY_CONVERT (float, SUM(CASE WHEN r.Rank = 1 THEN r.num_resenas_1 ELSE 0 END) )  AS Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas,
    -- Calcular el nmero de semanas con reseas en el ltimo ao
    TRY_CONVERT(float, SUM(CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(month, r.semana, GETDATE()) < 12 THEN 1
        ELSE 0 
    END)) AS num_semanas_con_resenas_ultimo_12_meses,
    TRY_CONVERT(FLOAT,SUM(CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(month, r.semana, GETDATE()) < 12 THEN r.num_resenas_semana
        ELSE 0 
    END)) AS num_resenas_ultimo_12_meses
FROM RankedResenasPorSemana r
GROUP BY r.place_id )
SELECT 
	place_id,
    desde,
    hasta, 
    semanas_historia,
    num_semanas_con_resenas semanas_con_resenas,
    num_resenas, 
    case 
    when semanas_historia > 52 then num_semanas_con_resenas_ultimo_12_meses/52 
    when semanas_historia > 0 then num_semanas_con_resenas_ultimo_12_meses/semanas_historia 
    else 0 end  ratio_semanas_con_resenas_ult_12m,
    case when num_resenas >0 then num_resenas_ultimo_12_meses/num_resenas else 0 end  ratio_resenas_ult_12m,
    case when num_resenas >0 then comentarios/num_resenas else 0 end  ratio_resenas_comentadas,
    case when comentarios >0 then num_respuestas/comentarios else 0 end  ratio_resenas_respondidas,
    TotalResenasEnSemanaMasResenas max_rese_semana,
    case when num_resenas >9 then (Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) /num_resenas else 0 end ratio_manipulacion,
    case when num_resenas >9 and (Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) >0 then Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas/(Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) else 0 end ratio_manipulacion_positiva,
    case when num_resenas >9 and (Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) >0 then Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas/(Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas+ Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) else 0 end ratio_manipulacion_negativa,
    num_resenas_5*5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+num_resenas_1 popularidad_teorica,
    (num_resenas_5-Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas) *5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+(num_resenas_1-Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas) popularidad_real,
    case when num_resenas>0 then (num_resenas_5*5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+num_resenas_1)/num_resenas else 0 end ranking_teorico,
    case 
	    when num_resenas>9 then ((num_resenas_5-Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas) *5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+(num_resenas_1-Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas))/num_resenas
	    when  num_resenas>0 then (num_resenas_5*5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3+num_resenas_2*2+num_resenas_1)/num_resenas
	    else 0 end ranking_real,    
	(num_resenas_5-Resenas_5_EnSemanaMasResenas) *5+num_resenas_4*4+num_resenas_3*3-num_resenas_2*2-(num_resenas_1-Resenas_1_EnSemanaMasResenas)*5 as satisfaccion_clientes_real
	into calculos.datos_place_manipulacion_review_new
	FROM ResenasPorPlace;
drop table calculos.datos_place_manipulacion_review;


EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_place_manipulacion_review_new', N'datos_place_manipulacion_review', 'OBJECT';



SELECT place_id,
    DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)) AS semana , count(*) num_resenas_semana,
    sum(case s.rating when '5.0' then 1 else 0 end) num_resenas_5,
    sum(case s.rating when '1.0' then 1 else 0 end) num_resenas_1    
into calculos.datos_evolucion_resenas_new
    FROM
    MAESTROS.LINK_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS l 
join MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEW_TEXTOS s on s.hash_key_review_place = l.hash_key_review_place and s.ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR ='S' 
   group by DATEADD(day, -DATEPART(weekday, TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)), TRY_CONVERT(date, date_review)), place_id

 

  
drop table calculos.datos_evolucion_resenas;

 EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_evolucion_resenas_new', N'datos_evolucion_resenas', 'OBJECT';

SELECT cod_agr_portales,
cod_agr_tramos,
ref_cat_finca,
cod_provin,
cod_munici_dgc,
cod_munici_ine,
seccioncensal, 
cod_via_ine,
provincia, municipio, localidad, tipovia, literalvia, numportal, letraportal, segundo_num_via, segunda_letra, cod_postal,
cast(replace(num_viviendas, ',','.') as int) num_viviendas,

cast(replace(num_inmuebles, ',','.') as int) num_inmuebles,
TRY_CONVERT(float, replace(superf_media_inmuebles, ',','.') ) superf_media_inmuebles,
TRY_CONVERT(int, replace(altura_inmuebles, ',','.') ) altura_inmuebles,

 geo_gps_y_latitud, geo_gps_x_longitud, geo_gps_y_x,

 f_datos_catastrales, f_proceso_actualizacion

scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE farma.calculos.datos_farmacias_2 (
	hash_codigo_centro nvarchar(64) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NOT NULL,
	nombre_oficial nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	fecha_primera_apertura date NULL,
	fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo date NULL,
	direccion_oficial nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	direccion_normalizada nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	precision_normalizacin float NULL,
	precision_busqueda_place float NULL,
	latitud float NULL,
	longitud float NULL,
	horario nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	estado nvarchar(100) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	place_id nvarchar(150) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	nombre_google nvarchar(200) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	afluencia nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	ratio_valoracion nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	comentarios_por_ratio nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	link_centro nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	informacion_servicios nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	Servicios_centro nvarchar(MAX) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_CP1_CI_AS NULL,
	geo_coordenadas geography NULL
	);

--TRUNCATE TABLE calculos.datos_farmacias_2;



SELECT
COALESCE (s2.cod_bbdd, concat('sin_bbdd_', p.place_id)) cod_bbdd,
COALESCE (l.hash_codigo_centro, concat('sin_hash_centro_', p.place_id)) hash_codigo_centro,
COALESCE (s2.nombre_cod_bbdd , p.name) nombre_oficial,
p.place_id ,
COALESCE (s2.dir_normalizada_cod_farma, p.full_address) direccion_oficial,
TRY_CONVERT(date, fecha_autorizacion_funcionamiento) AS   fecha_primera_apertura,
TRY_CONVERT(date, fecha_ultima_autorizacion) AS  fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo,
p.full_address  direccion_normalizada,
s2.semejanza_dir_place precision_normalizacin
,(try_convert(float,s2.semejanza_dir_place) +try_convert(float,s2.semejanza_cp_place))/2  precision_busqueda_place,
TRY_CONVERT(float,p.latitude) latitud,
TRY_CONVERT(float,p.longitude) longitud,
p.working_hours horario,
p.business_status estado,
p.name  nombre_google,
p.popular_times afluencia,
p.rating ratio_valoracion,
p.reviews_per_score comentarios_por_ratio,
p.street_view link_centro,
p.about informacion_servicios
,ser_cen.Servicios_centro
--count(*) , count(DISTINCT p.place_id) , count( DISTINCT COALESCE(p.place_id, s2.cod_bbdd  , l.hash_codigo_centro  ) )
into calculos.temp_calculo_farmacias
FROM farma.MAESTROS.pip_sat_place p
left  JOIN 
    (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY semejanza_dir_place DESC) as rn 
     FROM calculos.ranking_direcciones_normalizadas) as l ON l.place_id = p.place_id AND l.rn = 1
left JOIN 
    (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY semejanza_dir_place DESC) as rn 
     FROM farma.MAESTROS.sat_similitud_direcciones_cod_bbdd) as s2 ON s2.place_id = p.place_id AND s2.rn = 1
left join 
     MAESTROS.SAT_CENTRO_FECHAS_ADMIN s4 on s4.hash_codigo_centro= l.hash_codigo_centro and s4.ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR ='S'
left join MAESTROS.referencia_ubicaciones_multicentros ser_cen on ser_cen.address_label= s2.dir_normalizada_cod_farma
where     "type" IN('Pharmacy', 'Farmacia')  and TRY_CONVERT(float,p.latitude) is not null and TRY_CONVERT(float,p.longitude) is not null




insert into calculos.datos_farmacias_2 (hash_codigo_centro, nombre_oficial, fecha_primera_apertura, fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo, direccion_oficial, direccion_normalizada, precision_normalizacin, precision_busqueda_place, latitud, longitud, horario, estado,place_id, nombre_google, afluencia, ratio_valoracion, comentarios_por_ratio, link_centro, informacion_servicios, Servicios_centro, geo_coordenadas)
SELECT 
hash_codigo_centro, nombre_oficial, fecha_primera_apertura, fecha_ultimo_cambio_administrativo, 
direccion_oficial, direccion_normalizada, precision_normalizacin, precision_busqueda_place,
latitud, longitud, horario, estado,place_id, nombre_google, afluencia, ratio_valoracion,
comentarios_por_ratio, link_centro, informacion_servicios, Servicios_centro
,geography::Point(latitud, longitud, 4326) AS geo_coordenadas
--into calculos.datos_farmacias_2
FROM calculos.temp_calculo_farmacias p
JOIN (select DISTINCT golden_record from  MAESTROS.LINK_DUPLICADOS_PLACE_FARMACIAS L 
join MAESTROS.SAT_DUPLICADOS_PLACE_FARMACIAS S ON S.key_link_deduplicados_farmas= L.key_link_deduplicados_farmas
WHERE  proba_duplicado >0.55) DUP ON DUP.golden_record= p.place_id
WHERE 
    p.latitud IS NOT NULL AND p.longitud IS NOT NULL
    AND p.latitud BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND p.longitud BETWEEN -180 AND 180
;
EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_farmacias', N'datos_farmacias_old', 'OBJECT';
EXEC farma.sys.sp_rename N'farma.calculos.datos_farmacias_2', N'datos_farmacias', 'OBJECT';

drop table calculos.datos_farmacias_old;
drop table calculos.temp_calculo_farmacias;


WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY hash_codigo_centro  ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS rn
    FROM calculos.datos_farmacias
)
DELETE FROM CTE WHERE rn > 1;


ALTER TABLE calculos.datos_farmacias ADD CONSTRAINT PK_hash_codigo_centro PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (hash_codigo_centro);
CREATE SPATIAL INDEX idx_geoespacial_datos_farmacia ON calculos.datos_farmacias(geo_coordenadas);

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.link_hash_direccion_place
SELECT DISTINCT F.hash_direccion,  F.place_id,  LOAD_DTS START_DTS, NULL END_DTS
--into MAESTROS.link_hash_direccion_place
FROM farma.staging.pois_farmas F
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.link_hash_direccion_place L WHERE L.hash_direccion= F.hash_direccion AND L.place_id= F.place_id);

WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY concat(hash_direccion,place_id) ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS rn
    FROM MAESTROS.link_hash_direccion_place
)
DELETE FROM CTE WHERE rn > 1;

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_NO_VOLATILES
SELECT DISTINCT place_id, name, google_id, full_address, borough, street, postal_code, area_service, country_code,
country, city, us_state, state, plus_code, latitude, longitude, time_zone,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(64), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CAST(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONCAT(name, google_id, full_address, borough, street, postal_code, area_service, country_code,
country, city, us_state, state, plus_code, latitude, longitude, time_zone))) AS NVARCHAR(100))), 2) AS hash_diff_no_volatiles,
CAST(LOAD_DTS AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_DATETIME, CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'staging.pois_farmas' AS ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' AS ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_NO_VOLATILES_2
FROM staging.pois_farmas_hd f
WHERE (name IS NOT NULL OR google_id IS NOT NULL OR full_address IS NOT NULL OR borough IS NOT NULL OR street IS NOT NULL OR 
postal_code IS NOT NULL OR area_service IS NOT NULL OR country_code IS NOT NULL OR country IS NOT NULL OR city IS NOT NULL OR 
us_state IS NOT NULL OR state IS NOT NULL OR plus_code IS NOT NULL OR latitude IS NOT NULL OR longitude IS NOT NULL OR time_zone IS NOT NULL)
AND place_id IS NOT NULL
AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_NO_VOLATILES s 
    WHERE f.place_id = s.place_id 
    AND f.hash_diff_no_volatiles = s.hash_diff_no_volatiles
);

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_VOLATILES
SELECT DISTINCT place_id, site, phone, [type], logo, description, typical_time_spent, located_in, located_google_id, 
category, subtypes, posts, photos_count, cid, reviews_link, reviews_id, photo, street_view, about, [range], 
reservation_links, booking_appointment_link, menu_link, order_links, owner_id,
verified, owner_title, owner_link, location_link,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(64), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CAST(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONCAT(site, phone, [type], logo, description, typical_time_spent, located_in, located_google_id, 
category, subtypes, posts, photos_count, cid, reviews_link, reviews_id, photo, street_view, about, [range], reservation_links, booking_appointment_link, menu_link, order_links, owner_id,
verified, owner_title, owner_link, location_link))) AS NVARCHAR(100))), 2) AS hash_diff_volatiles,
CAST(LOAD_DTS AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_DATETIME, CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'staging.pois_farmas' AS ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' AS ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--into MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_VOLATILES_2
FROM staging.pois_farmas_hd f
WHERE (site IS NOT NULL OR phone IS NOT NULL OR [type] IS NOT NULL OR logo IS NOT NULL OR description IS NOT NULL OR 
typical_time_spent IS NOT NULL OR located_in IS NOT NULL OR located_google_id IS NOT NULL OR category IS NOT NULL OR 
subtypes IS NOT NULL OR posts IS NOT NULL OR photos_count IS NOT NULL OR cid IS NOT NULL OR reviews_link IS NOT NULL OR 
reviews_id IS NOT NULL OR photo IS NOT NULL OR street_view IS NOT NULL OR about IS NOT NULL OR [range] IS NOT NULL OR 
reservation_links IS NOT NULL OR booking_appointment_link IS NOT NULL OR menu_link IS NOT NULL OR order_links IS NOT NULL OR 
owner_id IS NOT NULL OR verified IS NOT NULL OR owner_title IS NOT NULL OR owner_link IS NOT NULL OR location_link IS NOT NULL)
AND place_id IS NOT NULL
AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_VOLATILES s 
    WHERE f.place_id = s.place_id 
    AND f.hash_diff_volatiles = s.hash_diff_volatiles
);


WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY place_id ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS rn
    FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_VOLATILES
)
DELETE FROM CTE WHERE rn > 1;

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA
SELECT DISTINCT place_id,  popular_times,typical_time_spent,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(64), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CAST( LTRIM(RTRIM(concat(popular_times, typical_time_spent))) AS NVARCHAR(100))), 2) AS hash_diff_popular_time,
cast(LOAD_DTS as date)  EFFECTIVE_DATETIME , CAST(NULL AS DATE) EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'staging.pois_farmas' ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA
FROM staging.pois_farmas_hd f
WHERE popular_times IS NOT NULL and place_id is not null
and NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA s WHERE f.place_id= s.place_id and f.hash_diff_popular_time=s.hash_diff_popular_time );

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA
SELECT DISTINCT place_id,  popular_times,typical_time_spent,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(64), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CAST( LTRIM(RTRIM(concat(popular_times, typical_time_spent))) AS NVARCHAR(100))), 2) AS hash_diff_popular_time,
cast(LOAD_DTS as date)  EFFECTIVE_DATETIME , CAST(NULL AS DATE) EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'popular_time_scrapi' ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA
FROM staging.popular_time_scraping_hd f
WHERE popular_times IS NOT NULL and place_id is not null
and NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA s WHERE f.place_id= s.place_id and f.hash_diff_popular_time=s.hash_diff_popular_time );




WITH CTE AS (
    SELECT *,
           ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY concat(place_id,hash_diff_popular_time) ORDER BY (SELECT NULL)) AS rn
    FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_AFLUENCIA
)
DELETE FROM CTE WHERE rn > 1;


INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS
SELECT DISTINCT place_id, rating, reviews, reviews_tags, reviews_per_score,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(64), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CAST(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONCAT(rating, reviews, reviews_tags, reviews_per_score))) AS NVARCHAR(100))), 2) AS hash_diff_review,
CAST(LOAD_DTS AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_DATETIME, CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'staging.pois_farmas' AS ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' AS ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS
FROM staging.pois_farmas_hd f
WHERE rating IS NOT NULL AND place_id IS NOT NULL
AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_REVIEWS s 
    WHERE f.place_id = s.place_id 
    AND f.hash_diff_review = s.hash_diff_review
);

INSERT INTO MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_HOURS
SELECT DISTINCT place_id, working_hours_old_format, working_hours, other_hours, business_status,
CONVERT(NVARCHAR(64), HASHBYTES('SHA2_256', CAST(LTRIM(RTRIM(CONCAT(working_hours_old_format, working_hours, other_hours, business_status))) AS NVARCHAR(100))), 2) AS hash_diff_hours,
CAST(LOAD_DTS AS DATE) AS EFFECTIVE_DATETIME, CAST(NULL AS DATE) AS EXPIRY_DATETIME,
'staging.pois_farmas' AS ETL_PROCESS_ID,
'S' AS ACTIVE_RECORD_INDICATOR
--into MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_HOURS
FROM staging.pois_farmas_hd f--staging.pois_farmas_hd f
WHERE (working_hours_old_format IS NOT NULL OR working_hours IS NOT NULL OR other_hours IS NOT NULL OR business_status IS NOT NULL)
AND place_id IS NOT NULL
AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM MAESTROS.SAT_DATOS_PLACE_HOURS s 
    WHERE f.place_id = s.place_id 
    AND f.hash_diff_hours = s.hash_diff_hours
);
